cards.flavor:
"On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura
cards.name: Act of Heroism
cards.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

cards.name: Adorned Pouncer
cards.text:
Double strike
Eternalize {3}{W}{W} ({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Angel of Condemnation
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
{2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
{2}{W}, {T}, Exert Angel of Condemnation: Exile another target creature until Angel of Condemnation leaves the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: The angels did not deceive. From the start, they were clear their allegiance was to the God-Pharaoh and to him alone.
cards.name: Angel of the God-Pharaoh
cards.text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: "This storm will calm. We must believe that."
cards.name: Aven of Enduring Hope
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven of Enduring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor:
"It is evidence that some pure corner of the world must still exist."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate
cards.name: Crested Sunmare
cards.text:
Other Horses you control have indestructible.
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.

cards.flavor: In the chaos brought by the new gods, swift-winged aven served as pathfinders, leading the last of the people away from the ruins of Naktamun.
cards.name: Dauntless Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Dauntless Aven attacks, untap target creature you control.

cards.name: Desert's Hold
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Desert's Hold enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

cards.flavor: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.
cards.name: Disposal Mummy
cards.text: When Disposal Mummy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

cards.name: Djeru, With Eyes Open
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Djeru, With Eyes Open enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
If a source would deal damage to a planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage.

cards.flavor:
"I was promised an afterlife, not this. Samut was right. The God-Pharaoh lied."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate
cards.name: Djeru's Renunciation
cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Buildings crumbled and monuments fell. The river bled and the sky wept tears of fire. All the while, servants silently continued their work, oblivious to it all.
cards.name: Dutiful Servants

cards.flavor:
"Gideon, how easy it must be to play the protector when you think yourself untouchable. How wrong you are."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Gideon's Defeat
cards.text: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.

cards.flavor: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"
cards.name: God-Pharaoh's Faithful
cards.text: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.
cards.name: Hour of Revelation
cards.text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

cards.flavor:
"It appears some mummies have begun to observe a hierarchy all their own."
—Elekh, vizier of embalming
cards.name: Mummy Paramount
cards.text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, Mummy Paramount gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Oketra's arrow is my spear, and her love my shield."
cards.name: Oketra's Avenger
cards.text: You may exert Oketra's Avenger as it attacks. When you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.
cards.name: Oketra's Last Mercy
cards.text: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

cards.name: Overwhelming Splendor
cards.text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.
Enchanted player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities or loyalty abilities.

cards.flavor: The sands of Amonkhet can be as much a boon as a bane. It depends entirely on which way the wind blows.
cards.name: Sandblast
cards.text: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.name: Saving Grace
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature you control
When Saving Grace enters the battlefield, all damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+3.

cards.flavor: The arrival of the God-Pharaoh marked a betrayal of both gods and mortals.
cards.name: Solemnity
cards.text:
Players can't get counters.
Counters can't be put on artifacts, creatures, enchantments, or lands.

cards.flavor: Deserts are inhospitable, not uninhabitable.
cards.name: Solitary Camel
cards.text: Solitary Camel has lifelink as long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Steadfast Sentinel
cards.text:
Vigilance
Eternalize {4}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Cleric with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: In the midst of disaster, heroic acts became almost ordinary, and ordinary warriors became heroes.
cards.name: Steward of Solidarity
cards.text: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Sunscourge Champion
cards.text:
When Sunscourge Champion enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its power.
Eternalize—{2}{W}{W}, Discard a card. ({2}{W}{W}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Unconventional Tactics
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, return Unconventional Tactics from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Outnumbered, but not outmatched.
cards.name: Vizier of the True
cards.text:
You may exert Vizier of the True as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, tap target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor:
"Kefnet taught us to turn obstacles into advantages."
—Neponem, vizier of Kefnet
cards.name: Aerial Guide
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Guide attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Our best chance against the Eternals will be tactics they've never seen and styles they've never trained in."
cards.name: Aven Reedstalker
cards.text:
Flash
Flying

cards.name: Champion of Wits
cards.text:
When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.
Eternalize {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: The Eternals had long since mastered every technique taught during the trials.
cards.name: Countervailing Winds
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Initiates who had been through the Trial of Knowledge learned to see everything as pieces of a larger puzzle.
cards.name: Cunning Survivor
cards.text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Cunning Survivor gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?"
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Eternal of Harsh Truths
cards.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Those wound tightest are first to unravel.
cards.name: Fraying Sanity
cards.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of cards put into that graveyard from anywhere this turn.

cards.flavor: To serve as an eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.
cards.name: Hour of Eternity
cards.text: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

cards.flavor: Liliana always knew Jace's illusions would come in handy.
cards.name: Imaginary Threats
cards.text:
Creatures target opponent controls attack this turn if able. During that player's next untap step, creatures they control don't untap.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"I had hoped for more from you, Jace. But I expected as much."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Jace's Defeat
cards.text: Counter target blue spell. If it was a Jace planeswalker spell, scry 2.

cards.flavor: In his final moments, Kefnet reached into the minds of those around him, desperate for logic within the consuming chaos.
cards.name: Kefnet's Last Word
cards.text: Gain control of target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

cards.name: Nimble Obstructionist
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Nimble Obstructionist, counter target activated or triggered ability you don't control.

cards.flavor: The sphinxes began to speak only after the Second Sun aligned. They whispered dire warnings, though no one listened.
cards.name: Ominous Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."
cards.name: Proven Combatant
cards.text: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Riddleform
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
{2}{U}: Scry 1.

cards.flavor: "The truth? It's been here all along. The Hours as we understood them are lies."
cards.name: Seer of the Last Tomorrow
cards.text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Sinuous Striker
cards.text:
{U}: Sinuous Striker gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
Eternalize—{3}{U}{U}, Discard a card. ({3}{U}{U}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
"They were once our brothers and sisters."
—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate
cards.name: Spellweaver Eternal
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

cards.flavor:
"Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Strategic Planning
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The denizens of the Luxa River woke angry on the currents of blood.
cards.name: Striped Riverwinder
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Supreme Will
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: The Locust God's children were numberless, relentlessly eating away every trace of the city's protection.
cards.name: Swarm Intelligence
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: Though Kefnet's followers feverishly searched his last words for some final riddle, they found only the gurgles of a dying god.
cards.name: Tragic Lesson
cards.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign
cards.text:
Flying
Sphinx spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign or another Sphinx enters the battlefield under your control, reveal the top four cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Unquenchable Thirst
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Unquenchable Thirst enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor: Skills mastered by initiates are preserved within cartouches, so Eternals remain adept at their preferred combat styles.
cards.name: Unsummon
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Vizier of the Anointed
cards.text:
When Vizier of the Anointed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with eternalize or embalm, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.
Whenever you activate an eternalize or embalm ability, draw a card.

cards.name: Accursed Horde
cards.text: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

cards.name: Ammit Eternal
cards.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal.
Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

cards.name: Apocalypse Demon
cards.text:
Flying
Apocalypse Demon's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Apocalypse Demon unless you sacrifice another creature.

cards.flavor: "If I die, it will not be alone."
cards.name: Banewhip Punisher
cards.text:
When Banewhip Punisher enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{B}, Sacrifice Banewhip Punisher: Destroy target creature that has a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: To the last, Bontu wanted only to be first among the God-Pharaoh's subjects.
cards.name: Bontu's Last Reckoning
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

cards.flavor: The banished have come home to roost.
cards.name: Carrion Screecher
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor:
"This place has outlived its usefulness."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Doomfall
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent exiles a creature they control.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

cards.name: Dreamstealer
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.
Eternalize {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: No cartouches to earn. No afterlife to enter. Only the glory of a well-struck blow and the growing pile of felled enemies at her feet.
cards.name: Grisly Survivor
cards.text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Grisly Survivor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The gods of the trials also faced the opportunity to prove themselves worthy.
cards.name: Hour of Glory
cards.text: Exile target creature. If that creature was a God, its controller reveals their hand and exiles all cards from it with the same name as that creature.

cards.flavor: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.
cards.name: Khenra Eternal
cards.text: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)

cards.flavor: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.
cards.name: Lethal Sting
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.
Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor:
"All the power you have gathered for yourself, Liliana, I can take away."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Liliana's Defeat
cards.text: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.

cards.flavor: The dead that swept across Naktamun came in all shapes and sizes.
cards.name: Lurching Rotbeast
cards.text: Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.
cards.name: Marauding Boneslasher
cards.text: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.

cards.flavor:
"My work here is complete. The people have done everything required of them."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Merciless Eternal
cards.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Merciless Eternal gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Before the monuments, before the first trials, before Naktamun itself, Bolas culled the plane of its adults in order to rebuild it for his own designs.
cards.name: Moaning Wall
cards.text:
Defender
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.
cards.name: Razaketh, the Foulblooded
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."

cards.text:
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

Deathtouch
When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

cards.flavor: Yell for help, and that may answer.
cards.name: Scrounger of Souls
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.flavor: "Your God-Pharaoh has returned."
cards.name: Torment of Hailfire
cards.text: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

cards.flavor: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.

cards.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.

cards.flavor: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.
cards.name: Torment of Venom
cards.text: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another nonland permanent or discards a card.

cards.flavor: The glyphs writhed and twisted, spewing out dark, vengeful magic.
cards.name: Vile Manifestation

cards.text:

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Perfectly adapted to cross the wastes in life, they bring the wastes with them in death.
cards.name: Wretched Camel
cards.text: When Wretched Camel dies, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target player discards a card.

cards.flavor: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.
cards.name: Abrade
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.
cards.name: Blur of Blades
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: "There is no afterlife. Not for me, and not for you. So think again before getting in my way."

First strike
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Burning-Fist Minotaur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?"
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Chandra's Defeat
cards.text: Chandra's Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The food chain doesn't end at sandwurms.
cards.name: Chaos Maw
cards.text: When Chaos Maw enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each other creature.

cards.flavor:
"We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

cards.text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.flavor: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.

Haste

cards.flavor: "Everyone here is a honed fighter. We'll respond the only way we know how."

cards.flavor: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.
cards.name: Firebrand Archer

cards.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.

Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

Menace

cards.flavor:
"Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Hour of Devastation
cards.text: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "When the whole world is crazy, it's important to find something you can rely on."
cards.name: Inferno Jet

cards.flavor: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

Menace

cards.flavor: The minotaur stared at the Eternal bearing down on him—the embodiment of deadly skill he had aspired to become.
cards.name: Kindled Fury
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Sand into glass and flesh into ash—such are the markers of its domain.
cards.name: Magmaroth

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Magmaroth.

cards.flavor: While most Eternals were initiates who completed the trials, Bolas had plans for some of Amonkhet's other denizens.
cards.name: Manticore Eternal
cards.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Manticore Eternal attacks each combat if able.

cards.flavor:
"This is what glory looks like."
—Nicol Bolas

cards.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

cards.flavor: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.
cards.name: Open Fire
cards.text: Open Fire deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"Neither the false God-Pharaoh nor his bugs will decide our fate."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate
cards.name: Puncturing Blow
cards.text: Puncturing Blow deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The bombardment of sand disorients, chokes, and ultimately tenderizes its prey.
cards.name: Sand Strangler
cards.text: When Sand Strangler enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you may have Sand Strangler deal 3 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: Those who fled the destruction of the city stumbled into the territory of their prickly neighbors.
cards.name: Thorned Moloch
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Thorned Moloch has first strike as long as it's attacking.

cards.name: Wildfire Eternal
cards.text:
Afflict 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.)
Whenever Wildfire Eternal attacks and isn't blocked, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: "Spent a lifetime learning from predators. Picked up a few tricks."
cards.name: Ambuscade
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.
cards.name: Beneath the Sands
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable."
"I never forgot."
cards.name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
cards.text: Vigilance, reach

cards.flavor: When Rhonas fell, his followers stirred with newfound strength—a final gift from a god they thought indomitable.
cards.name: Devotee of Strength
cards.text: {4}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The desert had once been a place of endless horror. It was now the last refuge as the city of Naktamun fell.
cards.name: Dune Diviner
cards.text: {1}, Tap an untapped Desert you control: You gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.
cards.name: Feral Prowler
cards.text: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.

cards.flavor: It basks atop the rubble of Rhonas's monument, which still pulses with latent power.
cards.name: Frilled Sandwalla
cards.text: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.flavor: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"
cards.name: Gift of Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

cards.flavor: She trusts that the potent poisons of her darts will reach the enemy before the enemy reaches her.
cards.name: Harrier Naga

cards.flavor: Some refused to leave their shattered homes, vowing to rebuild at any cost.
cards.name: Hope Tender
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
{1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.
cards.name: Hour of Promise
cards.text: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control three or more Deserts, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate
cards.name: Life Goes On
cards.text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.

cards.name: Majestic Myriarch
cards.text:
Majestic Myriarch's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of creatures you control.
At the beginning of each combat, Majestic Myriarch gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

cards.flavor:
"The soul of this world is gone, Nissa, and I would gladly kill it again."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Nissa's Defeat
cards.text: Destroy target Forest, green enchantment, or green planeswalker. If that permanent was a Nissa planeswalker, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "It's only the end if we allow it."
cards.name: Oasis Ritualist
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
"Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"
—Khemses, charioteer
cards.name: Overcome
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Pride Sovereign
cards.text:
Pride Sovereign gets +1/+1 for each other Cat you control.
{W}, {T}, Exert Pride Sovereign: Create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
"The ruin of the past is the topsoil of the future."
—Sokar, former Nef-crop initiate
cards.name: Quarry Beetle
cards.text: When Quarry Beetle enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"Respect is earned through deeds—or the capacity to bite someone in half."
—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate
cards.name: Rampaging Hippo
cards.text:
Trample
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: "This world was once so much more than the confines of Naktamun."
cards.name: Ramunap Excavator
cards.text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

cards.name: Ramunap Hydra
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Desert.
Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

cards.name: Resilient Khenra
cards.text:
When Resilient Khenra enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Resilient Khenra's power.
Eternalize {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Jackal Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Rhonas continued to fight until his last breath and even beyond.
cards.name: Rhonas's Last Stand
cards.text: Create a 5/4 green Snake creature token. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

cards.flavor: "Give me some room."
cards.name: Rhonas's Stalwart
cards.text: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
"Those who embrace the harsh land rather than fight it find they have a powerful ally."
—Nissa Revane
cards.name: Sidewinder Naga
cards.text: As long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, Sidewinder Naga gets +1/+0 and has trample.

cards.flavor:
"Rhonas's monument belongs to the wurms now. Look elsewhere for refuge."
—Arnun, vizier of the menagerie
cards.name: Sifter Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Sifter Wurm enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: The crocodiles of the Broken Lands, long used to feeding on undead flesh, eagerly flooded into Naktamun for a taste of something fresher.
cards.name: Tenacious Hunter
cards.text: As long as a creature has a -1/-1 counter on it, Tenacious Hunter has vigilance and deathtouch.

cards.flavor: The destruction of Rhonas's monument released his collection upon the city.
cards.name: Uncage the Menagerie
cards.text: Search your library for up to X creature cards with different names that each have converted mana cost X, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Bloodwater Entity
cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Bloodwater Entity enters the battlefield, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.name: The Locust God
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste.
{2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
cards.text:
+2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.
−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

cards.name: Obelisk Spider
cards.text:
Reach
Whenever Obelisk Spider deals combat damage to a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.
Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: "We are crops no longer. Reap elsewhere."
cards.name: Resolute Survivors
cards.text:
You may exert Resolute Survivors as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, Resolute Survivors deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"It's a cruel thing to give such a sad song to such a colorful creature."
—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate
cards.name: River Hoopoe
cards.text:
Flying
{3}{G}{U}: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

cards.name: Samut, the Tested
cards.text:
+1: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
−2: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
−7: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: The Scarab God
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
{2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: The Scorpion God
cards.text:
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
{1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"We are no longer in control."
—Elekh, vizier of embalming
cards.name: Unraveling Mummy
cards.text:
{1}{W}: Target attacking Zombie gains lifelink until end of turn.
{1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.name: Farm
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.name: Market
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Consign
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Oblivion
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Target opponent discards two cards.

cards.name: Claim
cards.text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Fame
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Struggle
cards.text: Struggle deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Survive
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Each player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

cards.name: Appeal
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Authority
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Tap up to two target creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Leave
cards.text: Return any number of target permanents you own to your hand.

cards.name: Chance
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Reason
cards.text: Scry 3.

cards.name: Believe
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Look at the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield if it's a creature card. If you don't, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Grind
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

cards.name: Dust
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Exile any number of target creatures that have -1/-1 counters on them.

cards.name: Refuse
cards.text: Refuse deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Cooperate
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Driven
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

cards.name: Despair
cards.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card."

cards.flavor: Although long since dead, the banished dissenters finally took their vengeance.
cards.name: Abandoned Sarcophagus
cards.text:
You may cast nonland cards with cycling from your graveyard.
If a card with cycling would be put into your graveyard from anywhere and it wasn't cycled, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's angels stripped former initiates of their cartouches and the fortifying magic they provided.
cards.name: Crook of Condemnation
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
{1}, Exile Crook of Condemnation: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

cards.name: Dagger of the Worthy
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has afflict 1. (Whenever it becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: God-Pharaoh's Gift
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Ironically, the statues had been constructed as a warning.
cards.name: Graven Abomination
cards.text: Whenever Graven Abomination attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard.

cards.flavor: The embodiment of yearning, forever drifting the deserts to find what had once made it whole.
cards.name: Hollow One
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card you've cycled or discarded this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"Though the afterlife, the city, and even the God-Pharaoh himself were one great deception, the ideals championed by the gods remain true."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate
cards.name: Manalith
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: Most mirrors show your reflection. Others show your potential.
cards.name: Mirage Mirror
cards.text: {2}: Mirage Mirror becomes a copy of target artifact, creature, enchantment, or land until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Decades to build. Hours to demolish.

cards.text:
Sunset Pyramid enters the battlefield with three brick counters on it.
{2}, {T}, Remove a brick counter from Sunset Pyramid: Draw a card.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1.

cards.flavor:
"Why wander in search of a new home when the path is laid out before you?"
—Pytamun, former Nef-crop initiate

cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Defender
{T}: Wall of Forgotten Pharaohs deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate this ability only if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The dead entered as worthy. They exited as Eternals.

When Dunes of the Dead is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor:
"What will happen to us?" they asked.
The vizier paused. "I think . . . I think that's up to us now."
cards.name: Survivors' Encampment
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Nissa, Genesis Mage
cards.text:
+2: Untap up to two target creatures and up to two target lands.
−3: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
−10: Look at the top ten cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: "All can't be lost. Nissa has shown me that."
cards.name: Avid Reclaimer
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Life will find a way, or it will make one.
cards.name: Brambleweft Behemoth
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.name: Nissa's Encouragement
cards.text: Search your library and graveyard for a card named Forest, a card named Brambleweft Behemoth, and a card named Nissa, Genesis Mage. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"Bolas's power on this plane can't be absolute. Look around you."
—Nissa Revane

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver
cards.text:
+3: Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.
−3: Destroy target creature. Draw a card.

cards.flavor: As the Second Sun glided into its final position in the sky, a chorus of wings sounded to herald the return of Nicol Bolas.
cards.name: Wasp of the Bitter End
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, you may sacrifice Wasp of the Bitter End. If you do, destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.
cards.name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
cards.text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.name: Visage of Bolas
cards.text:
When Visage of Bolas enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

cards.flavor:
"I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."
—Nicol Bolas
